Class CareerStaffController

java.lang.Object
CareerStaffController
public class CareerStaffController extends Object
Controller class that handles actions performed by career staff users. This controller provides operations to approve or reject company representatives, approve or reject internships, and process student internship withdrawal requests. It is implemented as a singleton so that a single shared instance is used throughout the application.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CareerStaffController getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of CareerStaffController. If no instance exists yet, a new one is created.
      Returns:
      the single CareerStaffController instance

    • approveCompanyRep

      public boolean approveCompanyRep(String companyRepId, CompanyRepDbMgr companyRepDbMgr)
      Approves a company representative with the given ID. If the company representative exists in the provided database manager, its status is set to CompanyRepStatus.APPROVED.
      Parameters:
      companyRepId - the ID of the company representative to approve
      companyRepDbMgr - the database manager used to retrieve and update the representative
      Returns:
      true if the representative was found and approved; false otherwise

    • rejectCompanyRep

      public boolean rejectCompanyRep(String companyRepId, CompanyRepDbMgr companyRepDbMgr)
      Rejects a company representative with the given ID. If the company representative exists in the provided database manager, its status is set to CompanyRepStatus.REJECT.
      Parameters:
      companyRepId - the ID of the company representative to reject
      companyRepDbMgr - the database manager used to retrieve and update the representative
      Returns:
      true if the representative was found and rejected; false otherwise

    • approveInternship

      public boolean approveInternship(int internshipId, InternshipDbMgr internshipDbMgr)
      Approves an internship with the given ID. If the internship exists in the provided database manager, its status is set to Status.APPROVED.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - the ID of the internship to approve
      internshipDbMgr - the database manager used to retrieve and update the internship
      Returns:
      true if the internship was found and approved; false otherwise

    • rejectInternship

      public boolean rejectInternship(int internshipId, InternshipDbMgr internshipDbMgr)
      Rejects an internship with the given ID. If the internship exists in the provided database manager, its status is set to Status.REJECT.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - the ID of the internship to reject
      internshipDbMgr - the database manager used to retrieve and update the internship
      Returns:
      true if the internship was found and rejected; false otherwise

    • approveStudentWidthdrawl

      public boolean approveStudentWidthdrawl(String studentId, InternshipWithdrawalDbMgr internshipWithdrawalDbMgr)
      Approves a student's internship withdrawal request.

      If a matching InternshipWithdrawalApplicant record is found for the given student ID, this method performs the withdrawal on that record.

      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student requesting withdrawal
      internshipWithdrawalDbMgr - the database manager used to look up withdrawal requests
      Returns:
      true if a withdrawal request was found and processed; false otherwise

    • rejectStudentWithdrawl

      public boolean rejectStudentWithdrawl(String studentId, InternshipWithdrawalDbMgr internshipWithdrawalDbMgr)
      Rejects a student's withdrawal request. Currently, rejecting a withdrawal does not change any stored data; the withdrawal record remains in the system.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student whose withdrawal is rejected
      internshipWithdrawalDbMgr - the database manager for withdrawal requests
      Returns:
      always true, as no changes are applied
